tenant.name: Las Reinas Colusa
tenant.description: Authentic Mexican Taqueria & Carniceria in Colusa, CA

sections.name: Tacos
sections.description: Street-style tacos on fresh corn tortillas

sections.name: Platillos
sections.description: Dinner plates with rice and beans

items.name: Huevos Rancheros

items.description: Scrambled eggs mixed with chorizo, served with rice, beans, and choice of corn or flour tortillas
